column2: Speed Force Freeze Pursuit set is a decent set from the DC Superheroes theme. It includes Cyborg&#39
column4: s car, and 4 minifigures. It was released in 2018 for $29.99 and has 271 pieces.

column1: The Flash- This is a new minifigure for The Flash that has nice new torso printing. It has gold outlines on the torso and has the standard Flash mask piece. 9.5/10
Cyborg- This new version of Cyborg has great new printing for the torso. 9.5/10
Reverse Flash- This is the first Reverse Flash minifigure we have got in Lego. He has good
column2: printing and is a great minifigure to get.10/10

column1: Killer Frost- This is also the first time we have got a Killer Frost Minifigure in Lego. She has decent printing and is nice to get. 8/10
The builds in this set are ok but not the best. Cyborg'
column2: s helicopter is good and has some nice play features. It has stud shooters and a canon that can shoot a net out. Killer Frost&#39
column3: s car is not that great and looks out of place. It has stud shooters but it doesn&#39

column1: This set has good minifigures but the builds lack a little. I like Cyborg'
column3: s car looks bad. This set has decent play features and all the figures look nice. If you are a flash fan then it would be nice to get this set but otherwise you can pass.&nbsp
